# Codebooks

Below you can find the codebooks of the data sets used for the primary analyses. To download them, go [here](https://github.com/stefanvermeent/abcd_ddm/tree/main/codebooks).

## ddm_data

```{r, include = FALSE, echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message=TRUE}
library(readr)
ddm_data <- read_csv("ddm_data.csv")
```

```{r}
ddm_data
```
